title: fix: add audio models to API key permissions UI
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Added audio models to the API key permissions selector, enabling granular access control for sound generation services.
gist.impact: Users can now create API keys specifically restricted to audio models like ElevenLabs and Whisper.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee DJ adjusting sliders on a retro mixing board with a golden key. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky pixels, musical notes floating in air, warm lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
